project.name: |-- 001-basic-internationalization
project.description:
Keywords: + Internationalization, i18n + ResourceBundle + Properties Files, Property Files + Locale
This project includes very simple examples involving Internationalization.
SimpleI18nDemo: Demonstrates how to read keys from Properties Files using a ResourceBundle and a Locale to display a localized welcome and goodbye message.
SwingDemo: Demonstrates how to manually localize a Swing application (button and labels text).
